meanings.definition: A monetary unit equal to one hundredth of a basic unit
meanings.sent1: I found ten centesimos on the ground.
meanings.sent2: She paid for the candy with a few centesimos.
meanings.sent3: The vending machine only accepted centesimos, so I had to find some.
meanings.sent4: In this country, centesimos are colorful and fun to collect.
meanings.sent5: The child saved up all his centesimos to buy a toy.

meanings.definition: One hundredth of a unit of currency
meanings.sent1: Grandma gave me a centesimos coin for good luck.
meanings.sent2: The price was just a few centesimos more than I had.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally dropped my centesimos in the fountain and made a wish.
meanings.sent4: Her savings grew by centesimos each day, slowly but steadily.
meanings.sent5: The beggar was grateful for any centesimos people could spare.
